00123 GrPixelBuffer::GetMatchingFormat( GrTextureBase::EFORMAT textureFormat )

00133 //----------------------------------------------------------
00134 GrPixelBuffer::GrPixelBuffer( unsigned int width, unsigned int height, EFORMAT format, EUSAGE usage )
00135 : _glHandle( 0 )
00136 , _width( width )
00137 , _height( height )
00138 , _size( 0 )
00139 , _resetStorage( 0 )
00140 , _format( format )
00141 , _usage( usage )
00142 , _mapped( false )
00143 {
00145         B_ASSERT( width > 0 && height > 0 );
00146 
00148         if ( usage == EU_READBACK || usage == EU_READBACK_DISCARD || usage == EU_READBACK_STREAM )
00149         {
00151                 B_ASSERT( _rawPixelFormatMap[ format ] != 0 );
00152         }
00153 
00155         if ( _format == EF_DXT1 || _format == EF_DXT5 )
00156         {
00158                 B_ASSERT( ( width & 3 ) == 0 && ( height & 3 ) == 0 );
00159 
00161                 unsigned int blockSize = _pixelSizeMap[ format ];
00162                 _size = ( width / 4 ) * ( height / 4 );
00163                 _size *= blockSize;
00164         }
00165         else
00166         {
00168                 _size = width * height * _pixelSizeMap[ format ];
00169         }
00170 
00172         AllocBuffer( NULL );
00173 }
00174 
00175 //----------------------------------------------------------
00176 GrPixelBuffer::~GrPixelBuffer()
00177 {
00178         B_ASSERT( !_mapped );
00179         GrDeletePB( _glHandle );
00180 }

00187 //----------------------------------------------------------
00188 void
00189 GrPixelBuffer::ReadPixels( unsigned int srcX, unsigned int srcY ) const
00190 {
00192         B_ASSERT( !_mapped );
00193         
00196         CHECK_GL();
00197         GrBindPackPB( _glHandle );
00198         unsigned int glFormat = _rawPixelFormatMap[ _format ];
00199         unsigned int glType = _rawPixelFormatTypeMap[ _format ];
00200         bglReadPixels( srcX, srcY, _width, _height, glFormat, glType, ( ( unsigned char* )0 ) );
00201         GrBindPackPB( 0 );
00202         CHECK_GL();
00203 }

00206 void
00207 GrPixelBuffer::UploadTexData( GrTexture* dst, unsigned int dstLevel, unsigned int dstX, unsigned int dstY ) const
00208 {
00209         CHECK_GL();
00210         GrBindUnpackPB( _glHandle );
00211         unsigned int glFormat = _rawPixelFormatMap[ _format ];
00212         unsigned int glType = _rawPixelFormatTypeMap[ _format ];
00213         dst->UploadPixelData( dstLevel, dstX, dstY, _width, _height, ( ( unsigned char* )0 ), glFormat, glType );
00214         GrBindUnpackPB( 0 );
00215 }

00225         dst->UploadPixelData( dstX, dstY, _width, _height, ( ( unsigned char* )0 ), glFormat, glType );
00226         GrBindUnpackPB( 0 );

00229 //----------------------------------------------------------
00230 void*
00231 GrPixelBuffer::Map()
00232 {
00233         if ( _usage == EU_READBACK || _usage == EU_READBACK_DISCARD )
00234                 return Map( true, false );
00235         return Map( false, true );
00236 }
00237 
00238 //----------------------------------------------------------
00239 void*
00240 GrPixelBuffer::Map( bool read, bool write )
00241 {
00243         B_ASSERT( read || write );
00244 
00246         B_ASSERT( !_mapped );
00247         _mapped = true;
00248 
00250         CHECK_GL();
00251 
00253         GLenum flags = 0;
00254         if ( read && write )
00255                 flags = GL_READ_WRITE;
00256         else if ( read )
00257                 flags = GL_READ_ONLY;
00258         else
00259                 flags = GL_WRITE_ONLY;
00260 
00262         void* mapPtr = 0;
00263         if ( _usage == EU_READBACK || _usage == EU_READBACK_DISCARD || _usage == EU_READBACK_STREAM )
00264         {
00266                 GrBindPackPB( _glHandle );
00267                 mapPtr = bglMapBuffer( GL_PIXEL_PACK_BUFFER, flags );
00268                 GrBindPackPB( 0 );
00269         }
00270         else
00271         {
00273                 unsigned int prevPB = GrGetUnpackPB();
00274                 GrBindUnpackPB( _glHandle );
00275                 mapPtr = bglMapBuffer( GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER, flags );
00276                 GrBindUnpackPB( 0 );
00277         }
00278 
00280         CHECK_GL();
00281 
00283         return mapPtr;
00284 }
00285 
00286 //----------------------------------------------------------
00287 void
00288 GrPixelBuffer::Unmap()
00289 {
00291         B_ASSERT( _mapped );
00292         _mapped = false;
00293 
00295         if ( _usage == EU_READBACK || _usage == EU_READBACK_DISCARD )
00296         {
00298                 GrBindPackPB( _glHandle );
00299                 bglUnmapBuffer( GL_PIXEL_PACK_BUFFER );
00300                 GrBindPackPB( 0 );
00301         }
00302         else
00303         {
00305                 GrBindUnpackPB( _glHandle );
00306                 bglUnmapBuffer( GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER );
00307                 GrBindUnpackPB( 0 );
00308         }
00309 }

00311 //----------------------------------------------------------
00312 void
00313 GrPixelBuffer::PreContextReset()
00314 {
00316         _resetStorage = new char [ _size ];
00317         void* data = Map();
00318         if ( data )
00319                 MemCopy( _resetStorage, data, _size );
00320         Unmap();
00321 
00322         B_ASSERT( !_mapped );
00323         GrDeletePB( _glHandle );
00324         _glHandle = 0;
00325 }
00326 
00327 //----------------------------------------------------------
00328 void
00329 GrPixelBuffer::PostContextReset()
00330 {
00331         AllocBuffer( _resetStorage );
00332         delete[] ( char* )_resetStorage;
00333 }

00340 //----------------------------------------------------------
00341 void
00342 GrPixelBuffer::AllocBuffer( void* data )
00343 {
00344         B_ASSERT( _size > 0 );
00345         B_ASSERT( _glHandle == 0 );
00346 
00348         _glHandle = GrGenPB();
00349 
00351         if ( _usage == EU_READBACK || _usage == EU_READBACK_DISCARD )
00352         {
00353                 GrBindPackPB( _glHandle );
00354                 bglBufferData( GL_PIXEL_PACK_BUFFER_ARB, _size, data, _usageMap[ _usage ] );
00355                 GrBindPackPB( 0 );
00356         }
00357         else
00358         {
00359                 GrBindUnpackPB( _glHandle );
00360                 bglBufferData( GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER_ARB, _size, data, _usageMap[ _usage ] );
00361                 GrBindUnpackPB( 0 );
00362         }
00363         CHECK_GL();
00364 }
